name: Plague Spirit
description: The Plague Spirit embodies decay and despair, marked by a cloud of green mist surrounding it. It has a spectral presence, exuding a menacing aura.
memorable: Its ability to inflict aging effects and diminish foes' Strength makes it a terrifying adversary.
goals: To weaken and incapacitate living creatures it encounters.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other fey creatures or undead.
environment: Associated with areas plagued by decay and despair, often surrounded by a sickly mist.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage, powerful multiattack abilities, and the ability to create debilitating mist.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence limits tactical communication; its mist doesn't affect undead or constructs.
attacks: Uses multiattack with Enfeebling Touch and a Censer, dealing both bludgeoning and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Dance of Death creates a large area of frightful necrotic damage that also causes fear.
additional_information: Immunity to several conditions including charm and poison.
Capable of sensing living creatures within a 50-mile radius.
Aging effect from Decrepit Mist can significantly impact long-term adventurers.
Can weaken foes by reducing their Strength effectively leading to their demise.
The combination of high Dexterity and Wisdom makes it elusive and difficult to combat.
test_queries: spirit that embodies decay and despair
fey creature surrounded by sickly mist
creature that weakens foes with aging effects
agile spirit capable of causing fear
